alert.note: Alert for White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 4:37PM CDT until August 26 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central White County in central Arkansas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 437 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Searcy, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Searcy... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... Albion... Providence... Armstrong Springs... Plainview in White County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
